name: MonSushi
description:
Fight hoards of monsters the only way you know how to... raw fish.

Serve sushi to monsters before they get angry and eat you instead. And make it quick, you don't want to get yelled at by your boss.

This game was made by Adam Morales and Nico Papalia

-Press alt + enter to fullscreen, press Escape to return to the start screen-

-Click on the ingredients to place them down-
